channel.title: Blogs on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Portfolio

item.title: Python and R
item.description: Over the past few months I have had the unique opportunity to learn how to code in RStudio. In recent weeks, I was introduced to the world of Python. It has been fascinating to learn how the two can interact with one another and work together. In this blog, I am going to display one of the fun (I found fun) functions that you can run in Python. In R, you are able to grab specific variables or observations that you are intersted in analyzing.
